page.title: 08MUSIC(CHOIRS)
page.content: THE OLDEST CHOIR IS THE {TREORCHY {ROYAL WELSH.}THIS CHOIR PERFORMED FOR {QUEEN VICTORIA}AT{WINDSOR CASTLE. {TREORCHY MALE CHOIR}WAS ORIGINALLY {FORMED IN 1867}, BUT THE PRESENT CHOIR WAS{REFORMED IN 1946}.LOVE OF MUSIC BRING THE 117 CHORISTERS,FROM ALL WALKS OF LIFE,TO 3 WEEKLY REHEARSALS. THE CHOIR HAS PERFORMED OVER 1000 PUBLIC CONCERTS,OVER 300 T.V. AND RADIO BROADCASTS AND MANY OVERSEAS TOURS TO FOREIGN COUNTRIES.THEY HAVE ALSO HAD 8 WINS AT THE NATIONAL EISTEDDFOD. {TREORCHY CHORAL SOCIETY}WAS{FORMED}IN BETHLEHEM CHAPEL IN{1967}.THERE WERE 200 MEMBERS AGED 17_80.AT PRESENT THERE ARE ONLY 90 MEMBERS.THEY HAVE APPEARED AT THE ROYAL ALBERT HALL,LONDON, ST. DAVID'S HALL,CARDIFF, AND ON T.V. AND RADIO.THEY REHEARSE TWICE A WEEK IN TREORCHY PRIMARY SCHOO
